title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message: i have 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery. and no green light on the charger.

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message:
Does it charge until 44% and then stuck?
Magsafe light must be orange to charge battery.
If you don't get green at least, never will charge.
Any history available?
Post exact PPBUS_G3H voltage without battery connected; also with charger + battery.
Need U6900/01 voltages too.
Check continuity from U6900 to central pin of Magsafe connector in DCIN board.
Did you try known good DCIN board?

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message:
no it not charge at all
PPBUS_G3H 12.5V with and without battery (why to test with and without battery ) 
U6900/01 3.3v
SMC_BC_ACOK 2.5 to 2.9v
yes I already tried a new DCIN
no history

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message:
"U6900/01 3.3v"
Each one has 5 pins; however, I'm not interested in ground pin voltage.
And voltage of pins 4/5 of U6900 is very important to know.

"why to test with and without battery"
Depending of battery state, should get different voltage!

Check voltage and diode mode to ground on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.
Percentage indication points to good communication, but is better to confirm.

If all is OK, seems to have a problem with SMC.
In such case, reflow it first; may need to reball, or change it.

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message: Sounds like bad battery, but this will have a dead GPU soon so who cares tbh

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message:
U6900/
05 2.9V
04 2.9V
01 3.5V
SCL/SDA 0.503 dido mode

but I don't have a green light on MagSafe even without battery

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message:
Do what I told on SMC.

GPU can be disabled, when finally dies...

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message:
GPU was replaced in China
suddenly it worked, but stopped after I replaced DCIN again it worked for a while it stopped again.
I just reballed SMC same ...
i dont have SMC now but i will order one

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message:
"it stopped again"
Still no light on magsafe?
If board reacts after applying heat, could also be PCH problem.
Resolder ISL6259 too.

title: 820-2914-B, turn on but stuck on 44% battery
message: DCIN  was the problem, I tested with a dead one thank you
